channel.title: Cathedral of Seville on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Cathedral of Seville on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Seville - Spain
item.description: I should have started jotting down all my memories from this beautiful city immediately after my return to Paris. But back to work and daily routine…. lots of finer moments are fading off. We took a morning bus from Granada to Seville; we reached Seville around 11AM. The bus ride was around 2 hours and 45 minutes. From that IntercityBus stop to our hotel (again Novotel) we took again local public bus.
